name: 917TheCurve
0:
”Alexa, ask curve radio what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask curve radio to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: curve radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Broadcasting from Jasper High School, this is student-run radio, 91.7 The Curve. WJPR is a non-commercial station, licensed to Jasper, Indiana and owned by the Greater Jasper Consolidated School system. We broadcast an eclectic AAA music format along with entertaining segments, local announcements, and sports for Jasper, Dubois County, and beyond.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
